project1.title: Cloud Comparisson Wep App
project1.description: A web app that helps users compare cloud service prices easily by providing a centralized platform for selecting and customizing cloud solutions.
project1.details: Our Cloud Price Comparison web app simplifies the process of choosing cloud services for both individuals and businesses. Designed as an open-source tool, it allows users to filter, select, and customize cloud solutions based on their needs. Unlike manually comparing pricing PDFs or using provider-specific tools, our app integrates APIs to fetch up-to-date pricing, ensuring users get accurate and transparent cost estimates.
